description: This dataset contains information about trees that have been planted in New York City by the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey from 2008 to 2012.  Trees are planted by the Port Authority or contactors on Port Authority Property.  Tree data includes the tree species, size, location and quantity.

metadata.attribution: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey

name: Trees Planted by the Port Authority of NY NJ in New York City:  Beginning 2008
